name: pocket-id
description: Pocket ID is a self-hosted authentication provider using QR codes and secure tokens. It enables passwordless login and account management with privacy focused on local control.
features: Passwordless authentication: Log in using QR codes and secure tokens without passwords.
QR code login: Scan QR codes with mobile device for quick and secure authentication.
Multi-factor authentication: Add extra security layer with time-based one-time passwords.
Account management: Manage user accounts and permissions through admin interface.
OAuth2 provider: Act as OAuth2 identity provider for third-party application integration.
Session management: Control active sessions with ability to revoke access from any device.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps authentication data under your control.
Mobile app: Dedicated mobile app for iOS and Android to manage authentication.
Biometric support: Use fingerprint or face recognition on mobile devices for added security.
Audit logging: Track authentication attempts and account changes for security monitoring.
Custom branding: Personalize login pages with custom logos and color schemes.
API access: Integrate with applications using REST API for programmatic authentication.
